channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump has delayed higher tariffs on cabinets and furniture until 2027. These stocks are getting a lift.
item.description: A troubled U.S. housing market, coupled with fear of tariff costs passed on to inflation-weary consumers, weighed on home-furnishing stocks in 2025.

item.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
item.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

item.title: ‘I have absolutely no idea what to do’: I was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and inherited $400K. How do I invest it?
Shannen Doherty’s estate claims ex-husband has refused to list $1.5 million Texas home
item.description: Shannen Doherty’s estate has claimed that her ex-husband Kurt Iswarienko owes money after refusing to list their $1.5 million Texas home, despite the ...

item.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
item.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

item.title: 2026 will bring more GLP-1 weight loss pills — and new habits. These stocks are poised to benefit
item.description: Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly are expected to bring GLP-1 pills to market in the new year, which is expected to boost the number being treated.

item.title: Bernie Sanders and Ron DeSantis speak out against data center boom. It's a bad sign for AI industry
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders has called for a data center moratoriu, while Gov. Ron DeSantis has pushed back on the AI industry in Florida.

item.title: Retail investors close out one of their best years ever. How they beat Wall Street at its own game
item.description: Mom-and-pop investors bought the dip at key points, giving them outsized benefits from the market's run this year.

item.title: End of an era: Warren Buffett serves last day as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO
item.description: While change for the company Buffett bought six decades ago is likely to be gradual, it is also inevitable.

item.title: Investors are betting these stocks will reap considerable returns in 2026
item.description: Investors shared some of their 2026 stock picks, including Adobe, Citigroup and TSMC, with CNBC's "Halftime Report" on Wednesday.
